alert.note: Alert for Butte, Blackfoot Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 5:24PM MST until December 19 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches possible north of Interstate 90. * WHERE...Georgetown Lake, Highway 12 Garrison to Elliston, Homestake Pass, MacDonald Pass, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 AM to 11 AM MST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday morning through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Butte, Blackfoot Region; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
